Text:
Don't waste your time with this release:

"The TRANSiENCE release suffers from jerky 
playback throughout. We are not sure if 
this is from either bad deinterlace, or 
an improper VFR encoding/muxing. This 
show is not hybrid and therefore VFR 
should not be used."

I can verify the issue with Herky/Jerky audio/video, synch issues, and dropped frames. This was poorly encoded, sorry [eztv] 1st bad file I have ever gotten from you. 
(tried file in WMP, VLC and on Boxee, same issues regardless of player/device)

I can verify the issue with Herky/Jerky audio/video, synch issues, and dropped frames. This was poorly encoded, sorry [eztv] 1st bad file I have ever gotten from you. 
(tried file in WMP, VLC and on Boxee, same issues regardless of player/device)
And what's with the sudden shift from posting .avi files to x264 .mp4 files?
I can't even get the torrent...I click on "Get this torrent"..and nothing.  I updated earlier this week...what is going on?

I have to admit I was a bit sad when I seen the quality of this episode compared to all the rest, but you are still the man and will always rule my tv. 
Many thanks.
How come no AVI files anymore?
Why the change to x264 and mp4? While you were doing (avi) it was perfect now I'm starting to avoid your torrents.
